TopicTitle: A casualty of the great DDoS of 2013 returns

Articles.Content: During the great DDos of 2013, thousands of account were destroyed by the rebelling servers. Among these was jmalouf11. However, due to wormhole/cyborg technology/spacetime anomaly/ability to create new account, he was resurrected as dubiousmaths, ready to launch some semi-successful rockets, and generally wreak havoc.
Welcome back then, and I hope you have a good time with your "reborn" account.

Im an anonymous. But I hate how hackers use ddos for bad things. Hackers aren't that bad actually. Like anonymous. They might hide there true identity. But there really friendly.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CzFW8s7tm-0

But Welcome to the friends and sorry for your account! Mine was lost too
